title: Keine Verbindung zum Server mehr möglich
body:
Moin seit dem heutigen Patch ist es mir nicht mehr möglich eine Verbindung zum Server aufzubauen.
Kann mich normal einloggen und komme bis zur Champselect.
Danach bekomme ich einen schwarzen Bildschirm und wenige Sekunden später die Meldung :
"Vebindung zum Server konnte nich hergestellt werden. Bitte überprüfen Sie ihre Netzwerkverbindung."
Hatte vorher nie Probleme mit der Verbindung daher gehe ich mal davon aus das alle Ports die benötigt werden offen sind.
netsh int ip reset & netsh winsock reset habe ich bereits ausgeführt.

Wäre für weitere Tipps wirklich dankbar ... 
Hier nochmal ein Logfile, kann damit wenig anfangen 

2017-11-08T14-15-53: LogOut_File: : logfile started
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Net Status: low-level initialize success.
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Note: this version (1/29/2017) has new data fields added
2017-11-08T14-15-53: time = time since start of game in ms.
2017-11-08T14-15-53: address = address of IP address
2017-11-08T14-15-53: incoming = total size of messages set to me in bytes. Spikes can indicate lag.
2017-11-08T14-15-53: outgoing = total size of messages set from me in bytes. Spikes can indicate lag.
2017-11-08T14-15-53: app_ctos = client to server bytes delta excluding overheads (app data only)
2017-11-08T14-15-53: app_stoc = server to client bytes delta excluding overheads (app data only)
2017-11-08T14-15-53: loss = number of packets lost. Can indicate lags.  Some node on the network is dropping packets or taking to long and we have to resend them.
2017-11-08T14-15-53: sent = number of packets sent. Spikes can indicate lag.
2017-11-08T14-15-53: ping = how long it takes for a packet to get back and forth. Spikes can indicate lag.
2017-11-08T14-15-53: variance = how much the ping is changing from avg ping. Spikes can indicate lag.
2017-11-08T14-15-53: reliable delayed = This occurs when we drop reliable packets from sending this frame because we are sending to much data. Unreliable are more likely to be dropped than reliable.
2017-11-08T14-15-53: unreliable delayed = This occurs when we drop unreliable packets from sending this frame because we are sending to much data.
2017-11-08T14-15-53: app update delayed = This occurs when the app is taking to long to run code caused by network packets (ie CPU) and packets are delayed until the next frame
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Time spent in critical section (frame) = This is the time the network thread is blocking the main thread from doing anything.
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Latency in Window = The average Latency in ms. of Reliable packets during this time slice
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Packet Loss % in Window = The packet loss % of Reliable packets during this time slice
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Jitter in Window = The average Jitter in ms. of Reliable packets during this time slice
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Overall Latency Min = The lowest Latency seen in ms. of Reliable packets up to this point in time
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Overall Latency Max = The largest Latency seen in ms. of Reliable packets up to this point in time
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Latency Min in Window = The lowest Latency seen in ms. of Reliable packets during this time slice
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Latency Max in Window = The largest Latency seen in ms. of Reliable packets during this time slice
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Latency packet samples = number of packets used in determining average latency from start of game
2017-11-08T14-15-53: Jitter packet samples = number of packets used in determining average jitter from start of game
2017-11-08T14-15-53: reconnect = flag to indicate one or more reconnects occurred
2017-11-08T14-15-53: [time], [address], [incoming], [outgoing], [app_ctos], [app_stoc], [loss], [sent], [ping], [variance], [reliable delayed], [unreliable delayed], [app update delayed], [Time spent in critical section (frame)], [Latency in Window], [Packet Loss % in Window], [Jitter in Window], [Overall Latency Min], [Overall Latency Max], [Latency Min in Window], [Latency Maxin Window], [Latency packet Samples], [Jitter Packet Samples],[reconnect]
2017-11-08T14-17-52: Memory Allocations 
 Current Allocations = 0 
 Total Allocations = 5 
 Max Allocations = 5 
 Out of Pool Allocations = 3 
 Out of Pool dealloc = 3 

2017-11-08T14-17-52: LogOut_File: : logfile stopped

replies.body:
Hat sich erledigt habe den Fehler gefunden .
Es handelt sich hier komischerweise nicht um ein Netzwerkproblem sondern um ein Grafikproblem.
Wenn jemand ein ähnliches Problem haben sollte dann editiert mal die game.dll in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Musste den Wert WindowMode=0 auf 1 setzen.
Hoffe der Grafikbug wird bald behoben denn es gibt keine neuen Treiber mehr für meine Grafikkarte xD 
und im Fenstermodus zu spielen ist nicht gerade geil ...
